column2: Shelly, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have been taking Bontril slow release for 2 months and have lost 25 lbs. My doctor prescribed it after blood tests and a detailed check up. It has been a great kick start to help me get back on track and feel motivated. My appetite is under control along with my cravings. I also have enough energy to walk 2 miles 4 times a week after working a 12-hour day. This medication is good for someone who is committed and is willing to make that lifestyle change. Bontril just gives you the jump to do it. My doctor has me under close supervision with monthly check ups on my weight and blood pressure (which has improved).

column9: UNDER DR. SUPERVISION I TRIED BONTRIL THINGKING IT WAS ANOTHER FADE,, BUT THANK MY LUCKY STARS THIS ONE WORKS, YES IT IS AN ADDICTIVE DRUG??????????I STARTED OUT AT 240 IN AN 2X....NOW I HAVE HAD TO SELL MY CLOTHES CAUSE I'M AN SIZE 8 THIS REALLY WORKS WITH EXERCISE AN LOW CARB DIETS....

column2: mcinnis363@aol.com, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
